Subjects: birds, as narrators; dialogues; chansons d’aventure
_description: A dialogue with a bird (? the human soul) — twenty-two 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

NLWPork10.First Lines:
Lovely lordynges ladys lykeWyves and maydynus
                    ryallyke…
NLWPork10.Editions:
Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard. 
             Early English Miscellanies in Prose and Verse.
         London: for the Warton Club, 1855: 1-6.
